Posts.Content: I felt the same way as you do probably still do,but i have found it helps a great deal chatting on here.My lymph nodes were affected so have to have radio after my chemo treatment.I am the first person in my family to have cancer and that is scary.I have two children a girl (30) and boy(24) and i have a gorgeous grandson who is 10mths old.They are my reason for beating this thing, gonna give it some serious kicking!!!!. -) Take care luv Debbie x
Posts.Title: New to all of this
